channel.title: Getting Started on Open Cluster Management
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Open Cluster Management

item.title: Install Hub
item.description: The are two ways to install the core control plane of open cluster management that includes cluster registration and manifests distribution. Prerequisite Install from source Install from OperatorHub Prerequisite Ensure kubectl and kustomize are installed. Ensure golang is installed, if you are planning to install from the source. Prepare one Kubernetes cluster to function as the hub. For example, use kind to create a hub cluster.

item.title: Install Klusterlet
item.description: After the hub is installed, you need to install the klusterlet on another cluster so that it can be registered and managed by the hub. Prerequisite Install from source Install from OperatorHub What is next Prerequisite Ensure kubectl and kustomize are installed. Ensure golang is installed, if you are planning to install from the source. Ensure the open-cluster-management hub is installed. See Install Hub for more information.

item.title: Install Application management
item.description: After hub is installed, you could install the application management components to the hub. Prerequisite Install from source Install from OperatorHub What is next Prerequisite Ensure kubectl and kustomize are installed. Ensure golang is installed, if you are planning to install from the source. Ensure the open-cluster-management hub is installed. See Install Hub for more information. Install from source Clone the multicloud-operators-subscription git clone https://github.

item.title: Install Discovery
item.description: After the hub is installed, the discovery component can be installed to help discover available clusters. Install from source Install from source To build, run, and sample the discovery operator, clone the repository below and follow the instructions within the README. git clone https://github.com/open-cluster-management/discovery.git

item.title: Install Policy Framework
item.description: After hub and klusterlet is installed, you could install the policy framework components to the hub and the managed clusters. Prerequisite Install from prebuilt images on Quay.io Prerequisite Ensure kubectl and kustomize are installed. Ensure golang is installed, if you are planning to install from the source. Prepare one Kubernetes cluster to function as the hub. For example, use kind to create a hub cluster.

item.title: Install Policy Controllers
item.description: After policy framework is installed, you could install the policy controllers to the managed clusters. Prerequisite Install configuration policy controller Install certificate policy controller Install IAM policy controller What is next More policies Prerequisite Ensure kubectl and kustomize are installed. Ensure golang is installed, if you are planning to install from the source. Prepare one Kubernetes cluster to function as the hub. For example, use kind to create a hub cluster.
